headline: Pence to campaign on eve of Georgia primary with Gov. Kemp, who's facing a Trump-backed challenge
author: Paul Steinhauser
sentences:
FIRST ON FOX: KEMP BRINGS IN BIG BUCKS IN GEORGIA'S GOP GUBERNATORIAL CLASH

FIRST ON FOX: CHRIS CHRISTIE TO JOIN KEMP ON GEORGIA CAMPAIGN TRAIL NEXT WEEK
Pence, a former Indiana governor before serving as vice president under former President Donald Trump, has been crisscrossing the country the past 15 months, helping to support and raise money for fellow Republicans running in the 2021 and 2022 elections.
